LANDING_PAGE_HERO_TEXT: Code Your Future, One Line at a Time
LANDING_PAGE_SUB_HERO_TEXT: Embark on an exciting journey to master programming with our interactive lessons, hands-on projects, and supportive community. Whether you're a beginner or looking to level up, we've got the tools to help you succeed in the world of coding.
STARTER_TEMPLATE_HERO_SECONDARY_TITLE: Your Journey to Becoming a Skilled Programmer Starts Here
PAGE_DETAIL_1_VALUE: Engage with hands-on coding exercises and real-time feedback to accelerate your learning.
PAGE_DETAIL_2_VALUE: Explore a wide range of programming languages, from beginner-friendly to advanced options.
PAGE_DETAIL_3_VALUE: Monitor your growth with detailed analytics and personalized learning paths.
FEATURE_1_BODY: Engage with hands-on coding exercises that reinforce learning and build practical skills.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Follow customized curricula tailored to your skill level and learning goals.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Write, run, and debug code directly in the app with instant feedback.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Connect with fellow learners and mentors to get help and share knowledge.

CONTACT_FORM_TITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Get Started on Your Coding Journey
CONTACT_FORM_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Have questions or ready to begin? We're here to help!
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Got questions about our coding education app? Find answers here!
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_1: Is this app suitable for complete beginners?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: Absolutely! Our app is designed to cater to all skill levels, from complete novices to experienced programmers looking to expand their knowledge.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_2: What programming languages does the app cover?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: We offer a wide range of programming languages including Python, JavaScript, Java, C++, and more. New languages and courses are added regularly to keep up with industry trends.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: How does the app help me track my progress?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: Our app features a personalized dashboard that tracks your completed lessons, coding challenges, and projects. You can also earn badges and certificates as you advance through the curriculum.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_4: Can I access the app on multiple devices?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: Yes! Our app is available on web, iOS, and Android platforms. Your progress syncs across all devices, allowing you to learn wherever and whenever it's convenient for you.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_5: Is there a community aspect to the app?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: Definitely! We have a vibrant community forum where you can connect with fellow learners, share your projects, ask questions, and participate in coding challenges and hackathons.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_1: Who is this programming learning app for?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: Our app is designed for beginners and intermediate learners who want to improve their programming skills. Whether you're a student, career changer, or hobbyist, our platform offers tailored learning paths to suit your needs.
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: We offer courses in popular languages such as Python, JavaScript, Java, C++, and more. Our curriculum is regularly updated to include the latest industry-relevant languages and frameworks.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: How does the learning process work?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: Our app uses a combination of interactive lessons, coding challenges, and projects to help you learn. You'll progress through modules at your own pace, with real-time feedback and support from our community of learners and mentors.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: Is there a free trial available?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: Yes, we offer a 7-day free trial so you can explore our platform and see if it's the right fit for your learning goals. After the trial, you can choose from our flexible subscription plans to continue your learning journey.
STARTER_TEMPLATE_FOOTER_CONTENT: © 2023 CodeQuest. Empowering learners to master programming, one line at a time.
CTA_TITLE: Master Programming, One Byte at a Time
CTA_BODY: Unlock your coding potential with our interactive learning platform. From beginners to advanced developers, we've got your programming journey covered.
CTA_CONTENT_SUBTITLE: Elevate Your Skills with Hands-On Coding Challenges
TESTIMONIAL_SECTION_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER: Discover how our app has transformed coding journeys
TESTIMONIAL_1_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: This app made learning to code fun and accessible. I went from complete beginner to building my own projects in just a few months!
TESTIMONIAL_2_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: The interactive lessons and real-time feedback have been invaluable. It's like having a personal coding mentor available 24/7.
TESTIMONIAL_3_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: I've tried many coding apps, but this one stands out. The project-based approach really helped me apply what I learned in practical ways.
HERO_SUBTITLE: Interactive lessons, real-world projects, and expert guidance to transform you into a skilled developer
NEWSLETTER_TITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Level Up Your Coding Skills with Our Weekly Dev Digest
STARTER_TEMPLATE_CALL_TO_ACTION_SUBTITLE: Learn programming at your own pace with interactive lessons, real-world projects, and expert guidance.
